name: Scofflaw
description: A tart, remarkably easy-drinking cocktail that remains one of the most refreshing ways to mix and drink whiskey.
ingredients: 3/4 oz grenadine or home made pomegranate syrup
instructions: Combine all ingredients except garnish in cocktail shaker filled with ice.
Shake vigorously for 15-20 seconds until well-chilled.
Strain into chilled coupe or Nick & Nora glass.
Garnish with orange or lemon twist.
